metadata.synopsis: Looted fake spear of the night. Used by old justiciars to symbolically kill Nightsong.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Loot a false spear of the night

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Used by initiates for the final step to becoming Dark Justiciar... not all were worthy of the Spear of Night, it seems.
0.context: NodeContext: Considering a ceremonial spear. Uncanny insight. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: A ceremonial spear... but not the true Spear of Night. Lady Shar's hand never held this.
1.context: NodeContext: Considering a ceremonial spear. Uncanny insight. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar.
